body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! This is Frank Rogers from Stellar Movie Theaters. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi! I'm having an issue with the pricing of the tickets I purchased online. They seem to be higher than advertised.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with our pricing. Before we proceed, may I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Marilyn Barnes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marilyn. For security purposes, could you provide me with your date of birth and the last four digits of the card used for the purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my date of birth is June 15, one nine eight six, and the last four digits are zero zero three nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thanks for that information. Allow me a moment to look into the pricing issue for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It appears there was a glitch in our system, and you were overcharged. We'll issue a refund for the difference right away. Is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that resolves my issue. Thank you for your quick assistance, I'm quite happy with the resolution!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marilyn! It was my pleasure to assist you. Thank you for choosing Stellar Movie Theaters. Have a great day!

The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.

of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation':

    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}

sentiment.summary: The customer raised a concern about being overcharged for movie tickets. The agent handled the issue professionally, identified a system glitch, and promptly issued a refund. The customer appreciated the quick resolution and expressed satisfaction.

issues_raised: Customer reported that the price charged for online movie tickets was higher than advertised.

resolution_quality.message: The agent confirmed the overcharge, explained the reason clearly, and processed a refund promptly, leaving the customer happy with the outcome.
resolution_quality.improvement: Proactively offering an apology gift or discount for future use could further enhance the customer experience.
